articles.author: Dylan Stableford
articles.title: Feb. 28 economic blackout: What's behind today's boycott of major retailers like Amazon and Walmart - Yahoo
articles.description: The People's Union USA, a self-described “grassroots movement” founded by John Schwarz, is encouraging Americans to refrain from making non-essential...
articles.content:
A grassroots organization is calling on Americans to participate Friday in what its calling the "Feb. 28 economic blackout" by refraining from buying goods from major retailers for 24 hours.
